markdown:
Naiad queens rule over pristine wildernesses centered around untouched lakes, massive rivers, or other collective bodies of fresh water. Bards' songs and artists' paintings of these powerful nymphs tend to depict naiad queens in their slightly more humanoid forms, which they don when they make the rare journey into civilized lands to garner allies, gather news, or gauge threats. Most naiad queens treat those who respect their domains with kindness, but they're fierce—and quick to eliminate foes. Their blinding beauty and breadth of offensive spells make naiad queens fierce opponents if forced into a fight. **[Recall Knowledge - Fey](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=43)): DC 25 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 23 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 20 [Naiad Queen](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3113) **Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 246 1.1 **Perception** +18; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=69) **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Elven](/Languages.aspx?ID=4), [Fey](/Languages.aspx?ID=119), [Thalassic](/Languages.aspx?ID=113) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +16, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +9, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +20, [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) +15, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +15, [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) +20, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +14, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +15 **Str** +0 **Dex** +5 **Con** +4 **Int** +3 **Wis** +4 **Cha** +7 **Animal Empathy** The naiad queen can ask questions of, receive answers from, and use the [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=39) skill with [animals](/Traits.aspx?ID=531).
**Tied to the Land** The queen is tied to a body of water or area with a great deal of water features. --- **AC** 26 **Fort** +15 **Ref** +18 **Will** +17 **HP** 100 **Resistances** [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=604) 10 **Weaknesses** [cold iron](/Equipment.aspx?ID=375) 10 **Nymph's Beauty** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=542), [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=590), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=647), [primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=676), [visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=727)) 30 feet. DC 23. A creature that fails its save is [stunned 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=93) and becomes stunned 1 each time it starts its turn within the aura for the next 24 hours, even if it can't see the naiad queen.
**Water Healing** ([healing](/Traits.aspx?ID=623), [primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=676), [vitality](/Traits.aspx?ID=509)) Water Healing (healing, primal, vitality) For every 10 minutes a naiad queen spends soaking in any body of water in her domain, she regains 30 Hit Points. --- **Speed** 25 feet, swim 25 feet **Melee** aqueous fist +18 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Water](/Traits.aspx?ID=165)), **Damage** 2d8+6 bludgeoning **Ranged** water orb +18 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [range 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [Water](/Traits.aspx?ID=165)), **Damage** 4d6 bludgeoning **Primal Prepared Spells** DC 28, attack +18 - **Cantrips (4th)** [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Frostbite](/Spells.aspx?ID=1539), [Guidance](/Spells.aspx?ID=142), [Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=171), [Stabilize](/Spells.aspx?ID=307) - **1st** [Air Bubble](/Spells.aspx?ID=5), [Fleet Step](/Spells.aspx?ID=122), [Gust of Wind](/Spells.aspx?ID=143) - **2nd** [Animal Messenger](/Spells.aspx?ID=11), [One with Plants](/Spells.aspx?ID=1618), [Revealing Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=1653) - **3rd** [Aqueous Orb](/Spells.aspx?ID=669), [Earthbind](/Spells.aspx?ID=94), [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148) - **4th** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148), [Summon Animal](/Spells.aspx?ID=316) **Primal Innate Spells** DC 28 - **4th** [Charm](/Spells.aspx?ID=34), [Create Water](/Spells.aspx?ID=53), [Hydraulic Push](/Spells.aspx?ID=154), [Tidal Surge](/Spells.aspx?ID=458) (at will) **[Change Shape](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=55)** ([Polymorph](/Traits.aspx?ID=127), [Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134)) **Focus Beauty** ([Emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [Incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134), [Visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=163)) If a target already affected by nymph's beauty fails its save, the image of the queen sears into the creature's mind, effectively [blinding](/Conditions.aspx?ID=59) the creature until its vision is restored with [_sound body_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1679) or a similar effect. The naiad queen can Dismiss the effect. **Inspiration** ([Emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134))
name: Naiad Queen

Bards' songs and artists' paintings of these powerful nymphs tend to depict naiad queens in their slightly more humanoid forms, which they don when they make the rare journey into civilized lands to garner allies, gather news, or gauge threats. Most naiad queens treat those who respect their domains with kindness, but they're fierce—and quick to eliminate foes.
